location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 57 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter outlines details of wool sales to Shaikh Nassir, Aga Hossein and Hadjee Ismael and other financial matters. The letter also provides an update on the political situation in Persia including news that Ally Morad Khan [Ali Murad Khan] has arrived at Tehran and not headed to Azarbijan [Azerbaijan]. Shipped by the Scorpion.
